title: 【急推】天水圍女義士被扯褲事件 有英文電郵範例 連登仔請推上國際

replies.msg:
今晚天水圍發生黑警扯女義士事件
我呢個天水圍牛極度憤怒
我地一定要將呢件事【國際化】
小弟準備左一份範例 可以send俾唔同國際女權關注者
參考左呢一個鐘以來連登網民嘅版本以及不同意見 加以修改
如果各路手足有意見 歡迎下面再執執

內容大致係：
（第一、二段）指出黑警係傳媒鏡頭前扯女義士褲，而且義士現在被拘捕，情況危急。
（第三段）香港人得悉新聞，對黑警的不合法而且不道德的行為，表示強烈憤慨，黑警的所作所為，旨在羞辱表達政治訴求的女士。
（第四段）引用聯合國 2019 年針對衝突中性別暴力的報告，指出性別暴力於政治及選舉過程當中，乃一個重要問題，當權者運用性別暴力，恫嚇女性參與政治，損害公民的政治參與權利。
（第五、六、七段）個人就是政治，表示我們對性別暴力以及中國式專制主義的抗拒。呼籲她們／他們關注香港議題，Stand With Hong Kong，若有需要，可以向我們索取更多資料。

大家請為女義士，為香港出一分力

今日罷工 罷工 罷工！
香港人 be water 之餘，更要有良心，講人話！（利君雅加油！）
======================================================================

Dear Emma,

As your ardent supporter from Hong Kong, we are writing to express our grave concerns over a case of human rights violation happened in Hong Kong.

Just hours ago, a number of male riot police officers dragged a female pedestrian onto the floor during a peaceful demonstration. Ignoring the dignities and rights of the victim, riot police officers brutally tore down her shorts and pants in front of journalists’ cameras. The whereabouts of the victim remained unknown as she has been arrested and detained by these officers.

Shocked by the news live, many Hong Kong citizens are outraged by the unlawful and immoral actions undertaken by the Hong Kong Police Force. The Force’s blatant and uncivilized practices have been aiming to humiliate females who are campaigning for their political rights.

“Sexual violence remains a consistent aspect of political or election-related violence. It has long been used to intimidate and punish political opponents, their family members and women human rights defenders ... The use of sexual violence as a form of political intimidation has a negative impact on civic participation, particularly among women.”

(Quoted from Section II 16, Report of the Secretary-General on conflicted-related sexual violence, 2019, United Nations)


“Personal is Political”. This is an always progressive spirit that the United States taught the entire world during the second wave of feminism. Sharing the We have no toleration against any violation of human rights on women. Today, Hong Kong citizens are peacefully demonstrating to reject China’s oppression and authoritarianism - which is now endangering a person’s essential human rights.

Hong Kong citizens have been appreciating for your continuous dedication in advocating human rights for the women. At this critical moment, we are here to sincerely invite you to spread the message throughout different channels.

Please let us know for any additional information we can provide for your reference.

Stand for Hong Kong. Fight Together for Universal Values and Human Rights.

Best,
Your supporter from Hong Kong
